title: Can't assign licenses to imported users
content:
After you export a source tenant and import it to a target tenant, an error occurs when you assign a license to an imported user.

Cause

After a tenant export and import, an imported user's Person record doesn't have an ExternalId value. Note: ExternalId is a hidden field in Service Management.

Solution 

All users have an external ID defined in Suite Administration. Synchronize their external ID values from Suite Administration: 

  1. In the agent interface, navigate to Administration > Master Data > People.
  2. Click Sync on the toolbar. The system synchronizes users including their external ID to their Person records. 
  3. Open the user's Person record, and assign licenses to the user. You should be able to do this without error.
